des:
WELL SAID promotes healthy, independent aging by linking older adults with their families and caregivers in a simple, daily, question-and-answer format. You can keep your loved ones up to date on your well-being status, collaborate on calendars and reminders, and access physical exercises, memory exercises, informative, encouraging and motivational well-being content, all designed to support your aging goals. Learn more at https://www.wellsaid.ai/talk-to-wellsaid.

WHAT WILL IT DO FOR ME:
If you are looking to live the best life you can; If you want to live life with purpose and fulfillment; And if you want to stay active and independent as you get older, then Well Said is where you’ll get the daily support you need. No matter where you are on life’s journey, the good news is that today can be the start of a new day – one where you take charge of living the best life you can.
And WELL SAID’s health and aging experts here to help keep you on track! How? With a simple daily well-being check in designed with the needs and challenges facing all older adults. Staying on top of important areas of active, healthy aging each day, you too can live a more vibrant and gratifying life. 
Get off to a great start each day by saying "Alexa – Open WELL SAID!"

WHAT WILL I EXPERIENCE:
Here is what you can expect from WELL SAID. Each day you’ll spend about 5 minutes or less checking up on different aspects of healthy, active and independent aging. After you are greeted and hear the day and date, we'll give you any appointments on your day's calendar and that day's weather forecast. Then you'll be asked a set of 2-4 questions around areas of well-being such as your physical activities and mobility, balance or fall risks, memory, engagement with friends, mood, nutrition, safety, and sleep. 
You’ll then be able to hear customized exercises, tips, and encouraging and inspiring content. Things that are relevant and helpful as you begin your day. Everything from mastering the world of Alexa, staying physically active, avoiding cognitive decline or falls, being engaged with friends and family, and even words of inspiration or encouragement. We’re making this a fun, engaging and informative daily program. 
We can connect your check in with family or loved ones through the Caring Companion app on their smart phone. Then they'll know how you're doing and be alerted to any areas of concern where you might use some support from them. 

HOW DO I GET STARTED:
If you haven’t already, be sure to add WELL SAID to your Alexa Skills, by saying "Alexa, Enable WELL SAID". Then each day, just say "Alexa, Open Well Said" to do your check in. 
When you first set up WELL SAID, you will be asked to allow "Permission" to link to your Amazon account. This allows us to send you emails and set up reminders for you, and allows you to connect your check in with family or loved ones through the Caring Companion app. 
You can also authorize these features using the Alexa App. Go to Skills & Games, and select the WELL SAID Skill. Once you have enabled the skill, you will see a blue SETTINGS button. Select that, and then click “Link Account” for Amazon Account Linking.

PLEASE HELP US:
We'd really appreciate you leaving us a review on Amazon. Don't forget to tell your friends about WELL SAID! And if you have any feedback for us, please email us at support@wellsaid.ai.

DISCLAIMER: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
